about_the_game:
Epoch Survival is an online shooter with elements of survival in extreme conditions. In the post-Soviet space, among the abandoned alleys of the city, broken houses, everyone is trying to survive, in search of food, weapons and ammunition, you will stumble upon enemies or friends who will later become your companions and support in these harsh conditions.

- Cars and helicopters are waiting for you in abandoned garages and airports, where you can quickly get to your desired destination.
- Create your own groups and take a leading position among the survivors.
- Take care of your health, stock up on food, warm things to survive a cold and harsh night.
- Don't trust strangers, because anyone can betray and take away everything you had.

content_descriptors.notes: In this project there are scenes of physical violence, such as: Murders, Causing harm to health, Shooting at enemy players.
